source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
    [Site Code],
    [Customer No],
    [Customer Name],
    [Customer Category],
    [Customer Subcategory Code],
    [Customer Group Code],
    [Customer Parent Group],
    [Customer Type],
    [Billing Type],
    [Channel],
    [Sub Channel 1],
    [Sub Channel 2],
    [Sub Channel 3],
    [Channel Type],
    [Customer Creation Date],
    [Customer Credit Limit Days],
    [Credit Limit (LCY)],
    [Customer Posting Group],
    [Customer General Business Posting Group],
    [Customer Discount Group],
    [Customer Price Group],
    [Currency Code],
    [Customer Invoice Discount Code],
    [Payment Terms Code],
    [Payment Method Code],
    [Collection Method],
    [Customer Scheme Applicable],
    [Customer Contact],
    [Phone No],
    [Phone No_2],
    [E-Mail],
    [PAN NO],
    [TIN NO],
    [Address],
    [Address 2],
    [City],
    [State],
    [Post Code],
    [Country Code],
    [Customer Salesperson Code],
    [Customer Executive Code],
    [Customer Route Code],
    [Customer Territory],
    'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Customer]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 2021 and year([Posting Date]) < 2023
UNION ALL
